title: Darkest Dungeon Build 7907
description:
Fix for exploit to complete quest multiple times when quitting out of the raid results screen
    Added logic to reduce back to back hero act outs of the same type
    Fix to quest generation problem when plot quests are avoided and roster is all high level
    Random kill boss quests are no longer generated (This was leading to problems where a particular variant of boss (e.g. Swine Prince) was being named, but it was actually a higher difficulty boss (e.g. Swine God). Now, only plot quests will generate bosses.)
    Buffs now update when torch level changes
    Some Dodges now properly display as Misses
    Removed waits when applying effects that did not have results (for example, curing blight on a hero that isn't blighted)
    Fixed battle icon rendering gold when being ambushed
    Selective RNG shaping and tuning to prevent unintended edge cases
    Weapon icons visually upgrade as you increase weapon level (armor icons will be coming in a future patch)
    Click to dismiss a hero 'bark' - toggle in the Options screen
    Added logic to avoid edge case bark stacking delays
    Health bars animate to show damage more clearly
    Damage Over Time (DoT) is now properly applied without delay at the start of an enemy turn saving 1.8 secs of hang time per DoT'd enemy!
    Various save file fixes
    Improved save recovery
    Windows XP support *
    OpenGL 2.1 support *
